channel.title: Injury Testing on ThapeloOnTheRun
channel.description: Recent content in Injury Testing on ThapeloOnTheRun

item.title: Getting back - Test runs
item.description: After eight weeks of no running, it was the time to test if the stress fracture is healed. I decided to do Treadmill running every other day for first few runs post the injury. This is how week 1 went. Week 1 22 to 28 July 2024 Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday 3 sets of (2 min Jog 8 min Walk) Rest 3 sets of (4min Jog 6 min Walk) Rest 3 sets of (6 min Jog
